radhakrishnan mahatha awadharanaya kara siti.samaja sewa amathyanshaye anugrahaya yatathe pasugiyada nuwaraeliya nagara shala shrawanagarayedi pawathi jangama sewaya ha samaja sathkaraka sewawedi disthrikkaye wadihitiyan sandaha rupiyal dahasaka dimanawak labadimata piliyela kara thibu nama lekhana desa awadhanaya yomu kirimedi me bawa pahadili winayi pawasiya.rupiyal dahase simawa gewima sandaha thoragena athi wadihitiyange nama lekhanayanta anuwa, hanguranketha kottasayen wadihitiyan 2000ka pirisak da, kothmale kottasayen wadihitiyan 1800ka pirisak ha walapane kottasayen wadihitiyan 1400ka pirisak nam kara athath nuwaraeliya kottasayen nam kara aththe, 356ka pirisak pamanaki..
ee siyalle aththe rajya ansha sewaye waraprasada labime apekshawaya.
thawaduratath anthawadayata idak naha amathya mano ganeshan mahatha pawasayi.
mi una hadenna puluwanne..

“thrasthawadaya madimatath, eyata sambandha wu siyalu dena sathi thunaka keti kalayak athulatha athadanguwata ganimatath apata haki wuna” yi ohu prakasha kale ya.eheth, “thrasthawadin ha eyata sambandha siyallan” sathi thunak athulatha madala athnam, hadisi nithiya dirgha kirima awahya wuye man da yanna pahadili kirimata sirisena asamath wiya.
